item.title: Demystifying AD - Planning A City Based On Active Directory
item.description: Intro If someone were to ask you, “What is Active Directory?” how would you even begin to describe it? Is it a product, a piece of software, physical servers, or the ubiquitous cloud? Lets ask our friendly AI overlords, ChatGPT, what Active Directory is in as short of terms as possible. Its response: “Active Directory is a Microsoft service for managing users, computers, and resources on a network. It organizes them in a hierarchical structure, offering centralized authentication, access control, and management.
